title: Cannes 2022 Zar Amir Ebrahimi Best Actress

sources.title: Cannes 2022 Zar Amir Ebrahimi Best Actress
sources.description: Cannes 2022 Zar Amir Ebrahimi Best Actress Iranian actress Zar Amir-Ebrahimi receives the Best Actress award for her role in the film Holy Spider on May 28. Iranian Zar Amir Ebrahimi has won the Best Actress award at the prestigious Cannes Film Festival for her role as a journalist helping to catch a serial killer in the thriller Holy Spider. Ebrahimi is an actor and assistant director as well as a photographer of socially relevant issues, and is believed to reside in France. "I have come a long way to be on this stage tonight," she told the audience at the final award ceremonies in Cannes. "It was not an easy story. It was humiliation, it was solitude but there was cinema, it was darkness but there was cinema. Now I'm standing in front of you on a night of joy," Ebrahimi said. Iranian Zar Ebrahimi Wins Cannes Best Actress Prize For Holy Spider Role گریه و بغض زهرا امیرابراهیمی ،برای آبادان و ایران
